alert.note: Alert for Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 09 at 10:14AM MDT by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northwestern Prowers, south central Kiowa and northeastern Bent Counties through 1045 AM MDT... At 1014 AM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 11 miles southeast of Haswell, or 28 miles northwest of Lamar, moving southeast at 25 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This storm will remain over mainly rural areas of northwestern Prowers, south central Kiowa and northeastern Bent Counties. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Lamar Vicinity, Prowers County; Las Animas Vicinity, Bent County; Western Kiowa County
